welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bayport, a charming town known for its beautiful coastline and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport is exclusively for private flights and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
